metadata.title: CVE-2022-44789 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A logical issue in O_getOwnPropertyDescriptor() in Artifex MuJS 1.0.0through 1.3.x before 1.3.2 allows an attacker to achieve Remote CodeExecution through memory corruption, via the loading of a craftedJavaScript file.

criterions.comment: mujs package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
